Events that occurred on 19 June.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 198.
1983 - Actor Aidan Turner is born.
2002 - Starter decks of "Realms of the Elf-lords", the third set in The Lord of the Rings Trading Card Game, are released.
2007 - The Lord of the Rings (musical) opens in London at the Theatre Royal, Drury Lane.
2020 - Actor Ian Holm dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Faramir dreams the first time of Isildur's Bane.
